variables.name: STAGE
variables.note: Current SPECTRA stage (source, extract, clean, etc.)

variables.name: BASE_URL
variables.note: Zephyr API base URL (from contract.yaml endpoints.host)

variables.name: BASE_PATH
variables.note: Zephyr API base path (from contract.yaml endpoints.basePath)

variables.name: TEST_PROJECT_ID
variables.note: SpectraTestProject ID - locked to project 45 for this environment. Environment-specific constant, NOT a pipeline parameter.

variables.name: DISCORD_WEBHOOK_URL_ZEPHYR
variables.note: Discord webhook URL for Zephyr pipeline notifications (data-zephyr-pipelines channel). Source stage will automatically send completion notifications to this webhook.
